accessibilityStates.name: unknown
accessibilityStates.heading: Unknown accessibility state
accessibilityStates.description: There isn't any accessibility data available about this stop. Consider adding your own review below.

accessibilityStates.name: accessible
accessibilityStates.heading: Usually free of access barriers
accessibilityStates.description: This stop is likely accessible and is reported in working order.

accessibilityStates.name: construction
accessibilityStates.heading: Construction blocking bus lane or stop
accessibilityStates.description: This stop is temporarily affected by construction which blocks busses or riders from reaching the stop.

accessibilityStates.name: other-temporary
accessibilityStates.heading: Other – temporarily inaccessible
accessibilityStates.description: This stop is temporarily inaccessible. Refer to the reviews below for more information.

accessibilityStates.name: parking
accessibilityStates.heading: Street parking often blocking curb
accessibilityStates.description: This stop is often affected by street parking which blocks direct access to the curb.

accessibilityStates.name: limited-maneuverability
accessibilityStates.heading: Limited maneuverability for some riders
accessibilityStates.description: This stop doesn’t provide enough space or level concrete to maneuver while using certain types of mobility aids.

accessibilityStates.name: poor-conditions
accessibilityStates.heading: Poor conditions in surrounding areas
accessibilityStates.description: This stop has accessibility barriers in the general area surrounding it which may affect connections with transit or destinations.

accessibilityStates.name: other-complicated
accessibilityStates.heading: Other – it's complicated
accessibilityStates.description: This stop may or may not be accessible depending on your individual circumstances. Refer to the reviews below for more information.

accessibilityStates.name: inaccessible
accessibilityStates.description: This stop has significant access barriers and is not equipped with alternative entryways.

accessibilityStates.name: missing-landing
accessibilityStates.heading: Missing landing pad for ramp deployment
accessibilityStates.description: This stop doesn’t have an inlet landing pad for the ramp to deploy onto.

accessibilityStates.name: insufficient-dimensions
accessibilityStates.heading: Insufficient landing pad dimensions
accessibilityStates.description: This stop doesn’t have a landing pad large enough to accommodate many types of mobility aids.

accessibilityStates.name: insufficient-curb
accessibilityStates.heading: Insufficient curb height to create shallow ramp angle
accessibilityStates.description: This stop doesn’t have a raised curb to aid in creating a suitable ramp angle.

accessibilityStates.name: uneven-surface
accessibilityStates.heading: Uneven surface for alighting or deploying
accessibilityStates.description: This stop has an uneven or unstable surface which makes it unsuitable to safely board, or which holds the ramp from fully touching down.

accessibilityStates.name: missing-paths
accessibilityStates.heading: Missing pathways to any surrounding areas
accessibilityStates.description: This stop is missing accessible pathways, such as sidewalks, to any possible nearby destinations.

accessibilityStates.name: obstacles
accessibilityStates.heading: Unavoidable obstacles
accessibilityStates.description: This stop has permanent, unavoidable obstacles which prevent boarding.

accessibilityStates.name: other-inaccessible
accessibilityStates.heading: Other – not accessible
accessibilityStates.description: This stop is not accessible. Refer to the reviews below for more information.
